`pip --use-deprecated legacy-resolver download ...` fails at b88addeaf5fde848733d7ef631caa522eb1cfa53 ### Description

I bisected to b88addeaf5fde848733d7ef631caa522eb1cfa53 (#11945) using:
```
PYTHONPATH=src python3.12 -mpip --use-deprecated legacy-resolver download setuptools==68.0.0

  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/cli/req_command.py", line 248, in wrapper
    return func(self, options, args)
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/commands/download.py", line 133, in run
    requirement_set.warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers()
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/req/req_set.py", line 89, in warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers
    version = req.get_dist().version
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/req/req_install.py", line 598, in get_dist
    raise AssertionError(
AssertionError: InstallRequirement setuptools==68.0.0 from https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/c7/42/be1c7bbdd83e1bfb160c94b9cafd8e25efc7400346cf7ccdbdb452c467fa/setuptools-68.0.0-py3-none-any.whl has no metadata directory and no wheel: can't make a distribution.

    status = run_func(*args)
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/cli/req_command.py", line 248, in wrapper
    return func(self, options, args)
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/commands/download.py", line 133, in run
    requirement_set.warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers()
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/req/req_set.py", line 89, in warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers
    version = req.get_dist().version
  File "/home/jsirois/dev/pypa/pip/src/pip/_internal/req/req_install.py", line 598, in get_dist
    raise AssertionError(
AssertionError: InstallRequirement setuptools==68.0.0 from https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/c7/42/be1c7bbdd83e1bfb160c94b9cafd8e25efc7400346cf7ccdbdb452c467fa/setuptools-68.0.0-py3-none-any.whl has no metadata directory and no wheel: can't make a distribution.
```

extract_relevant.explanation: The bug occurs when using `pip download` with the deprecated legacy-resolver flag. The error happens in the `warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers` method where it tries to get the distribution version from an InstallRequirement that has no metadata directory and no wheel, causing an AssertionError.
extract_relevant.code snippet:
raise AssertionError(
    f"InstallRequirement {self.name} from {self.link} has no metadata directory and no wheel: can't make a distribution.")

query_preview:
The bug occurs when using `pip download` with the deprecated legacy-resolver flag. The error happens in the `warn_legacy_versions_and_specifiers` method where it tries to get the distribution version from an InstallRequirement that has no metadata directory and no wheel, causing an AssertionError. InstallRequirement get_dist raise AssertionError(
    f"InstallRequirement {self.name} from {self.link} has no metadata directory and no wheel: can't make a distribution.")
